translations.common:subscribe_cta: Stay informed and safe by searching and subscribing to places you care about!
translations.activity_breakdown:title: Type of activities
translations.modal:generic_description: Adding Activazon to your Home Screen can allow you to use some cool features for free
translations.modal:pwainstall_feature1_description: Receive push notification alerts when activity is detected in your neighborhood
translations.modal:pwainstall_feature2_description: Discover what is happening near you
translations.modal:pwainstall_instruction_nonios_1: To continue, tap the menu in your browser's menu
translations.modal:pwainstall_instruction_ios_1: To continue, tap the button below
translations.modal:pwainstall_instruction_ios_2: then tap Add to Home Screen
translations.modal:unsupported_message_1: Look's like your browser or device does not support this feature
translations.modal:unsupported_message_2: Try opening www.activazon.com in a different browser or device to continue.
translations.modal:open_in_browswer_instruction_1: To continue, tap the button
